file_insights.test_coverage: Comprehensive rendering tests for ProfileCard component

patterns_discovered: Extensive use of mocking for dependencies and child components
Data factory methods for creating test data
Multiple test suites covering various rendering scenarios
Defensive programming with null/edge case handling
gotchas_discovered: Handling of null/undefined values in user data
Conditional rendering based on theme and user roles
recommendations: Add more edge case tests for extremely sparse user data
Consider property-based testing for data variations
Add performance tests for rendering with large/complex user objects
